problem.p: My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: a. The work done by all non-conservative forces on the block is easily calculated.
b. There is a collision between the block and the spring.
c. It is necessary to find the force of the block as it hits the spring.
d. The forces on the block are different when the block is in contact with the spring.
e. Statements b, c and d are all needed to explain the decomposition.
